title: Bug 6410 - File Unchanged but Dirtied by Code Assist
description: When using code assist, the file is dirtied even when no suggestions are provided.
OB: Upon invoking code assist without any suggestions, the file is marked as dirty.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirty.
SR: 1. Open a Java file. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call. For example, consider "I" to be the cursor below: Object o = anotherObject.method(I); Press Ctrl+Space.
